snippet.title: Void Scout | First Look | indie.io
snippet.description:
Get the first look at Void Scout, an upcoming tense tactical roguelike being developed by 
Adversity Games Ltd. 

Wishlist Void Scout today to keep up to date on its development. 
➤https://bit.ly/VoidScout 

In Void Scout, an interdimensional war is being waged over the very fabric of reality where only you can prevent the Exoforms from consuming reality.
 
As the Void Scout, you will have decisions to make, strategies to test, and sci-fi horrors to face in turn-based combat set on procedurally generated space stations where everything is out to kill you. Do you have what it takes to save reality and stand tall against the horrors of the multiverse?

Visit indie.io on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/4e91q5q

#indiegames #pcgaming #roguelike
